name: Shogi (itch)
description:
Simple, lightweight Shogi game.

Local or online matches vs other players. Online requires port forwarding by one player in order to host a match.

Currently no AI opponents, replays, handicaps etc. These and other features may be added in the future.

Feedback is appreciated!

CONTROLSShogi

Left Mouse Click - Move or drop a piece without promoting.

Right Mouse Click - Move a piece and promote, if possible.

Menus

Enter or Left Mouse Click - Confirm

Shift or Right Mouse Click - Cancel

Arrow Keys - Move selection
